attributes.action: take no action whatsoever against Jeremy Clarkson for his recent comments on Top Gear
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jeremy Clarkson recently made comments (about truck drivers murdering prostitues) on the programme "Top Gear". These comments were obviously in jest, caused offence to few, and he should have no disciplinary action taken against him for them.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
